That looks very nice! I love interiors and part-built cockpits.

+rep
Great looking plane but it looks like a hybrid of the F22 and the F35 vs just an F22. The air intakes are styled after the F35.

Great looking plane but it looks like a hybrid of the F22 and the F35 vs just an F22. The air intakes are styled after the F35.

The description did say intakes needed work. I was never and still am not good with intakes. And I didn't work on it because it's a 0.90 plane which got trashed by the update...
